^([a-zA-Z_][a-zA-Z0-9_]*)?@(odata|Redfis.description: This property shall specify a valid odata or Redfish property.
This property shall specify a valid odata or Redfish property.

AllowableMax.description: The maximum allowable value for this control.
AllowableMax.longDescription: This property shall indicate the maximum allowable value of the SetPoint property for this control.

AllowableMin.description: The minimum allowable value for this control.
AllowableMin.longDescription: This property shall indicate the minimum allowable value of the SetPoint property for this control.

Persistency.description: Indicates whether the desired set point control value will be retained over subsequent resets.
Persistency.longDescription: This property shall indicate whether the desired set point control value will be retained over subsequent resets, where a value `true` shall indicate that the set point control value is persistent after a device reset.  If this property is absent on a PATCH operation for writing SetPoint property, the default is false.

SetPoint.description: The desired set point control value of EDPp scaling percentage.
SetPoint.longDescription: This property shall contain the desired set point control value of EDPp scaling percentage.  This property may be written with the desired value of Persistency property.  If Persistency property is absent on a PATCH operation, the default is false.

^([a-zA-Z_][a-zA-Z0-9_]*)?@(odata|Redfis.description: This property shall specify a valid odata or Redfish property.

EDPpPercent.longDescription: This property shall contain EDPp (Electrical Design Point Peak) scaling percentage control for this resource.  It allows users to query and control the programmable EDPp thresholds by specifying a percentage scaling value, without necessarily lowering the current power limit.

PowerMode.longDescription: This property shall contain the power mode setting for this resource.

enumDescriptions.Custom: Custom mode.  This value shall indicate the GPU will operate with the power limit specified in the SetPoint property.
enumDescriptions.MaxP: Maximum performance mode.  This value shall indicate the GPU will operate unconstrained up to its maximum performance level.
enumDescriptions.MaxQ: Maximum efficiency mode.  This value shall indicate the GPU will operate with optimized performance per watt.

ResetEDPp.description: This action is used to reset EDPp scaling percentage to a device default.
ResetEDPp.longDescription: This action shall reset EDPp scaling percentage to a device default.

^([a-zA-Z_][a-zA-Z0-9_]*)?@(odata|Redfis.description: This property shall specify a valid odata or Redfish property.

title: #NvidiaEnvironmentMetrics.v1_0_0
